posts.description: VoCore is an open hardware runs OpenWrt. It has WIFI, USB, UART, 20+ GPIOs but size is only one inch. It helps you make a smart house or study embedded system.

posts.message: any Suggestion for free .net library handling SMS , I've tried http://www.nuget.org/packages/GSMComm/ but I think it's little bit outdated ...bad queuing ...and more then 64 character received in discrete messages

posts.description: GSMComm is package for GSM phones, mainly for performing SMS-related tasks.

What is the difference between AngularJS & AJAX ?

دي hands-on exercises للناس اللي بيتعلموا  javascript أو TDD with jasmine 
(لان الفكرة انهم  بيستخدموا  jasmine علشان يشرحوا js )

عبارة عن المكتبة نفسها (jasmine) مع شوية ملفات مليانين errors و انت بتصلحهم و بتشوف ال output من خلال ال browser. في البداية ال quizzes بتبقى سهلة عشان تعرفك على ال architecture بتاعة المكتبة بعد كدة بتبدأ تزيد شوية بشوية.

(ملحوظة: لازم يكون عندك خلفية و لو بسيطة جداً عن js) 

محاولة ناجحة لخرق طريقة التعليم التقليدية.
posts.caption: github.com

posts.message:
hello, everyone.
I was wondering if you guys can help me on something.
I'm required to build a website, just the front-end of it, and I am required to write javascript code that would allow the nav bar background color to change when the user clicks a link (that targets an element on the page) or the user scrolls to that element so the background of the bar would be the same as that of the element.
is there a plugin for that? I'm searching but my deadline is approaching.
thanks a lot
